channel.title: Homes on Naoya Yamaguchi
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Naoya Yamaguchi

item.description: Biography Naoya Yamaguchi is hogehoge. ヤマグチナオヤは、

item.title: Awards
item.description: Final Round of Sausu-Olympic (算数オリンピック), 2007. A-Rank score at Japan Junior Mathematical Olympiad (ジュニア数学オリンピック), 2011. I got top 5% score (A-Rank) and participated in the Final Round. I won the Outstanding Performance Award at Kansai region(地区優秀賞). Found Round of Kagaku-no-Koshien (科学の甲子園), 2012. Japan High School Science Championships A-Rank score at Japan Mathematical Olympiad (数学オリンピック), 2013. I got top 5% score (A-Rank) and participated in the Final Round.

item.title: Experiences
item.description: America Grobal Training Program in Utah, America, 2010. One week home stay and many other activities. Test Monitor of National Center Test for University Admissions (センター試験), 2015. Opening member of Z会東大個別指導教室プレアデス, 2015. Part-time job for one year. Internship at Furukawa Electric Co., Ltd. , 2016. Three weeks. Information Science and Technology Education Program in Hyderabad and Bangalore, India, 2018. Workshop with students in Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad.
